homeautomation.sensors

Class Dht22

  • java.lang.Object
    • homeautomation.sensors.Dht22
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHumiditySensor, ISensor, ITemperatureSensor

    public class Dht22
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITemperatureSensor, IHumiditySensor
    Representation of a DHT22 temperature and humidity sensor.
    Author:
    Philipp Jenke

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Dht22.Mode
      The dummy mode is used for debugging where the physical sensor is not available.
